item.title: Dataframes
item.description: Introduction This is the tenth post in the series Introduction to R. In the previous post. In the previous post, we learnt about lists. In this post, we will learn about dataframe. create dataframe select columns select rows utitlity functions Create dataframes Use data.frame to create dataframes. Below is the function syntax: args(data.frame) ## function (..., row.names = NULL, check.rows = FALSE, check.names = TRUE, ## fix.empty.names = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = default.
